Jenny has long, medium-textured hair which is naturally black in colour. It hadn&#8217;t been cut in several months and was feeling a little drab and unruly.</description><source>Life</source><pubDate>Fri, 03 Jun 2016 19:49:03 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.theprovince.com/cms/binary/11962973.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /></item></channel></rss>
